bike.description: 6061 TIG-welded aluminum, Hudson laid-back design with low ride height, replaceable derailleur hanger
bike.paint_description: M: Cantaloupe, Electric Blue or Gloss Blue   F: Cantaloupe, Daiquiri Blue or Sangria

components.description: SR Suntour NEX4600-V2, alloy crown and sliders, coil spring with external preload adjustor and lock-out, 63mm travel
Alex DC25 alloy double-wall rims, 36H, Formula alloy QR hubs, 14g stainless steel spokes
Jamis Sport Comfort, 26 x 1.95", with silver stripe
Forged alloy crank, single 42T chainring, 170mm, with full length chainguard
Hi-rise comfort, 15JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 80mm rise x 640mm wide
Alloy micro-adjust, 31.6 x 350mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis Comfort with memory foam, synthetic suede top, burnished side panels and bumper springs
